name: Broiled Miso Salmon Fillets
author: A Day In the Kitchen
summary: Broiled miso salmon fillets that are easy to prepare, taste fabulous, and make for a great weeknight meal. What more could you want?
directions: Toast sesame seeds in a small saucepan over medium heat, stirring occasionally, about 2 minutes
Watch them closely and remove from heat once sesame seeds are a golden brown
Combine miso paste, mirin, soy sauce, ginger, and honey in a small bowl
Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler
Line a baking pan with foil and lightly grease with oil
Coat salmon well in the miso sauce and place skin-side up on the baking pan
Broil in the preheated oven, watching closely, until fish flakes easily with a fork, 10 to 15 minutes
